text: la ytsawa almtkhlfwn ean aljhad fi sabil allah -ghyr 'ashab al'aedhar mnhm- walmujahidun fi sabil allh, bi'amwalihim wanfshm, fddal allah taealaa almujahidin ealaa alqaedyn, warafae mnzlthm darajatan ealiat fi aljnt, waqad waead allah kulana min almujahidin bi'amwalihim wa'anfusihim walqaedyn min 'ahl al'aedhar aljanat lima bdhlu wdhhu fi sabil alhq, wfddal allah taealaa almujahidin ealaa alqaeidin thwabana jzyla
